description: The ideal outdoor pants for taking long winter walks, spending time with the little ones or simply taking care of the terrain! With high stretch and a comfortable regular fit, the Move-On men's pant offers unparalleled freedom of movement. You'll love the articulated knees and crotch gusset as well as the adjustable bottom with an elastic drawstring to keep snow or cold out. Athletic and versatile pants that suit your active lifestyle.
name: Chlorophylle Move-On Pants - Mens
